title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Adnan Khalid
text:
Great ambience, spot on service. The food though is varied but not extraordinary. Regular Javanese food priced higher and plated fancy :)
Worth a visit. The stir fried papaya leaves are recommended

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: monica pricilia
text: Authentic place offers dishes that are similar to the food served at the Kraton Yogyakarta, some of the meals originally created by the sultans. Though a bit pricey, this restaurant is intended to preserve culture, especially in culinary! Must try!

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Cristianto Chandra
text: Great service and good atmosphere. I ordered lamb steak, tapak kucing and beer jawa. Enjoyed the tapak kucing, it's kind of a roasted banana dessert. For the lamb steak, can't say much, was expecting the taste to be more flavourful, I think they can prepare it better

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Deepa Chaudhury
text:
The restaurant is in the Sultans palace complex in Yogyakarta . The menu includes dishes from the Sultans own kitchen. There is a certain charm to the place which I would put down as amalgamation of elegance and old world charm.
The food is very different from what one gets in regular restaurants in Yogyakarta . There isn't much for vegetarians though.The portions aren't very large.The presentation is good and the service fairly prompt. And like most places in Yogyakarta the service is with a smile.
Overall a nice place for a meal if you enjoy a meal in a Javanese style covered pavilion without a.c..
The ambience is casual though the local guests seem to be the upwardly mobile gentry of Yogyakarta.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Jariaman Barus
text:
A royal cuisine restaurant. All the dishes is used to served at ‘Keraton’. The taste and presentation is amazing, surprisingly the price is very affordable. Bestik Lidah and Beer Jawa is recommended.

The atmosphere is very great, love the interior, ambience, and service from the team. Recommended to have experience eating in a royal cuisine restaurant.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: 1995jp Sakura
text: The local character is reflected in the cuisine.  The prosperity of the royal family and court cuisine are inseparable.  In Solo City, there is a restaurant on the grounds of the Royal Palace that serves court cuisine.  Three to six people can sit around a table and share the dishes.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: 鈴木慎一朗
text:
初めてのジョグジャカルタで、タクシーの運転手さんに教えてもらった知る人ぞ知るインドネシア料理の名店！！
屋根はあるが壁のない建物なので虫が苦手な方は避けた方が良いと思います。
アルコールや豚料理はありません。

ナシゴレンや薬膳スープなど定番料理中心の構成で塩味がしっかり付いていて美味しいです。
肉は少し硬めでしたが、味がしっかりしているので満足できました。

飲み物はほぼ薬膳ドリンクで、生姜が効いたスパイスドリンクがメイン

コーヒーなどもいただけます。

ジョグジャカルタ王室見学に立ち寄られた方は是非足を運んでみてください！！

現地を味わえます！

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Austin Chang
text:
蘇丹皇室料理，是由蘇丹十世弟弟所投資開設的傳統印尼美食，據說味道有依現代口味做微調。
本日我們點了台灣報紙介紹的蘇丹九世最愛鴨肉以及他最愛的特色飲品secang，這個鴨肉完全不行啊，騷味濃厚...飲品到是可稍做嘗試，飲品的糖是另外加的，無糖不太好喝，可以依自己喜歡的甜度做調整！
場地蠻大的可以想像宴客時的熱鬧程度，由於我們是週二晚上過去，並沒有太多的客人。

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Heri
text:
This restaurant serves Javanese traditional foods. Some of them are King's and royal family favourites foods that we can't get from any other restaurant.

The taste is fine for me, some are delicious, some just okay for my pallet. The views are beautiful. There also art gallery inside the restaurant. You can see some batik, gamelan and paintings.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Angelo Li
text:
餐點不錯，但飲料沒啥味道。
加上我們冷氣吹習慣了，又偏偏中午去吃，實在熱到胃口不好

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Kurokakoii
text: Quite decent place to try the signature Keraton (Palace) Yogyakartan's dishes. Fully occupied on weekends and public holidays, maybe you need to reserve in advance to get your seat during these days.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: azhar faris
text: In this restaurant, the food served is very rarely found in other places. it tastes authentic, and medhok is typical Javanese food. Very good service, friendly and responsive. However, cleanliness needs to be improved, especially regarding the cutlery used.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Halida Budining
text: It is located inside the Keraton. We arrived at dawn, a lil bit creepy at first. We want to sit in a center table, but they say it already reserved. But until we finished our dinner, the guest which reserved that table are not coming yet. I tried Lontong kikil, it was good. And dessert, Manuk Enom and wedang jahe. They're all delicious. You better choose the menu that Royal Family's favourite menu. Because it was delicious. For Bakmi Jawa, I wouldn't recommend it. The taste was horrible. Overall, they have exellent services of fine dining. The staffs were so polite and friendly. The price also reasonable.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Ichsan Ramadhan
text: Semur pitik was soso, lombok kethok was delicious. Indoor room needs more lighting. Toilet only 2 for this big resto, need more.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Inda Risinda
text: Actually this place is good as a place but for food I think not as what I expected.. I was here with the tour group and they only served you like 5 menu.. the taste were okay but I guess it could be better.. maybe the travel agents who was not really good arranging the food.. so I think I should visit here again by my own one day.. nevertheless it's a good resto..

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Eduardo P
text:
I would give this 3 or 4 stars for it's uniqueness. and that is the place, and some of the food, but not the taste. it tasted pretty average. Although there are some menu i've never heard before, so it's pretty exciting to find food you don't usually see.

We've come in the evening and it's the light is pretty dimmed. but that's just how i imagine the royal palace is (this is probably in keraton-palace area and they serve foods that are favored by the sultans)

Building is antique, with old furnitures, place is clean as usual, staff is ok. Maybe visit them once while you're in yogyakarta.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: florencia juliani tanu
text: Overall, it was good. But the soup kind of bland. Definitely recommend you to order the steam fish with lemongrass, stir fried green bean, and soy souce beef stew (forgot the name).

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Widita Rarasati
text: The place is near Keraton Jogja.. it's called the Sultan's Dishes.. the dishes that used to cook for royal family. The atmosphere is very nice and traditional. However, the food and  the taste itself can be improved.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Ihda Maulida
text: A very unique restaurant, located within Jogja palace area. Such a cozy place with  many helpful and polite staff. There are varieties of food and drinks offered which are mostly Sultan's favorite dishes. Traditional menu served in international restaurant standard. The drinks, especially the traditional one such as wedang secang and wedang kamijoro are great, but the food taste just ok with a small portion. The price is quite high because of the service tax, but it is quite reasonable.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Jaime A
text:
Comida tradicional de Java al parecer los platos que comían los sultanes.
Los camareros muy amables y atentos.
Postres con un sabor muy diferente a lo esperado 👍🏻.
El precio era correcto.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Metty Fauziah Wardhani
text: My family had a quite large family gathering and we.decided to have dinner at Bale Raos, which we did without prior reservation. The menu consists of the delicacies that are often served in the sultanate household. However most of us just had desserts because we were still full from the late lunch we had earlier, so I can't say much about the food except so so. Waiters were patient enough to cater our orders and needs. I must say it was definitely the right decision to choose the place to have the family gathering.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Cees
text: Geweldige atmosfeer. Bediening was goed, de presentatie uitstekend. Maar het eten was bij elkaar genomen hooguit redelijk tot goed. De Jokjakartaanse keuken is vrij zoet van zichzelf. Daar moet je wel rekening mee houden. Maar de 2 groentegerechten prik arik en sayur kare (favorieten van de sultan) die we hadden, waren nauwelijks gekruid. Misschien hadden we juist geen favorieten moeten kiezen. De kangkung was prima en de deng deng ragi perfect. Maar toch geen 5 sterren.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Raja
text: Great services, good local taste (javanese), nice serving and plating and clean toilet. All food and beverage menus of Sultan’s delight. Fresh and unique menus. I like Java Beer (non alkohol), it was authentic drink from kerathon  Yogyakarta special serve for Sri Sultan Hamengku Buwono VIII (1921 - 1939). This drink also called magic drink. Nice to try and Enjoy !

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes

The foods are delicious for me, but my friends dont like how the chicken or duck taste like. I ordered the set menu and for me it was delicious and kind of cheap.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Devianty Arinta
text: I love their food, you can order the food with knew the history of the food. And you could know what's Sultan favorite food. And the place is comfortable..but the price is little pricey

Has good services and comfortable place

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Rio Gultom
text:
A meaningful dinner experience, no less. In this itinerary, you are expected to have self-service   management to fulfill your hunger. It has an iftar concept during Ramadan, which brings you towards a bunch of arabian-related and various Javanese theme dishes that you should try whenever possible.
Worth a try for you who loves all-you-can-eat dinner with a limitless amount of time for you to try everything on the table!

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes

text: Il ristorante è situato nel centro commerciale.  Piatti locali buoni. Bu9na varietà. Consigliato

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Lucie Hordequin
text: Restaurant traditionnel avec des repas locaux ils offrent un menu en anglais par qr code, nous avons opté pour le nasi goreng de la maison ainsi que la boisson citronnelle et lime, c'était très bien!

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Harbrianto Hartono
text: Njawani .... ayam gorengnya enak banget 👍

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Michelle
text:
Semur Daging Giling (main dish) & Manuk Enom (dessert) are my favorites. The dessert (as attached) is very unique and presented like a bird, using Melinjo as its wings (Manuk Enom is a Javanese word for young bird). There's fermented green sticky rice (Tape Ketan Ijo) inside the cake, which makes the dish even tastier.

There is also a live band playing Keroncong, starting from 7 pm.

Definitely worth to try, especially for local & int'l tourists.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Adwina Marisa
text: Like the ambience, it's part of the palace, the food has great taste, but it's hot here my kids can't enjoy it

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: M. CS
text: Love the place. Just ate the dessert, the taste was so so, but they serve it quick, including the steak.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Selma Yilmaz Karaca
text: Heerlijke dishes. Zeker een bezoekje waard!

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Sufyan Jidda
text: Bale Raos offers a pleasant dining environment, though the cuisine didn't quite suit my taste. It appears to be popular among locals, suggesting the dishes cater well to Indonesian palates. Non-Indonesian diners might find the flavors less appealing, but the cultural authenticity and ambiance still make it an interesting experience for those looking to explore traditional Javanese cuisine.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes

text: The location inside the keraton. The food quite good. The place and service very good. Another experience to have lunch.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes

name: Cees Holster
text:
Speciaal restaurant.
Temeer daar het ook het paleis van de sultan is.
Zeer goed en lekker eten.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: S. Artanto
text:
This restaurant serves various Javanese traditional food. Moreover, there is some King's and the royal family favourite food that we can't get in other restaurants. The presentation is also great. They bring a lot of traditional style culinary aspects on the table and its environment. Surprisingly, the price is still affordable.
Don't forget to try my favourite beverage, Javanese beer, don't worry it is zero alcohol. It is made of turmeric, ginger and other secret ingredients. The taste is great when it served cold.
Last, if you are a Moslem, you don't need to worry since they only provide halal food.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Yufa Armyando
text: The food was so-so but the experience was a go-go! You can dine like a Sultan's guest here with exquisite service but the food itself was not it for me

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Gian Giovani
text:
Many times heard about this place but never had chance to come, it quite famous, a place where people can taste what Sultan eat.

There're a lot options on the menu, so it will takes time to choose a dish from, quite confusing honestly. We ordered several foods like Gencok Kambing, Dendeng Ragi, Bestik Jawa, Sekul Blawong set and some other dishes. I think the dish in general not bad, but it's not particularly good. The sauce on the bestik was too overpowering, Sekul Blawong was very standard the only thing we love was the Dendeng Ragi. Dendeng ragi is a beef dish with toasted shredded coconut, it taste like rendang but on a sweeter side, and the toasted coconut made it to another level.

The price is on the range of Jakarta restaurants, so it's on the higher price for Jogja. With the same price probably we will get better food from Sate Khas Senayan, but the option and experience is something that people need to try at least once.

Let me know if you find my review helpful

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Zukhrufal Jannah
text: This is definitely the taste of Java. They really showed a great hospitality in here. You'll never get bored with the sound of Javanese traditional music here. title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Cardo Bangun
text:
Bagi yang menyukai masakan autentic Indonesia, ini mungkin bisa dicoba.
Tapi kemarin seperti nya kurang cocok dilidah, mungkin karena saya belum terbiasa dengan masakan pedas, tapi bistik yg potongan daging sapi itu enak. Untuk live music pas kami datang (dinner time) belum ada juga.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Agisha
text:
Kesini sama rombongan kantor, jadi ga bisa pilih menu.

Waktu itu ada semur bola daging, satu-satunya menu yang paling disuka 😅 terus ada ayam kemangi, terong goreng dan itu semua saya ga suka tapi mencoba mencicipinya.

Ada sayur asem, tapi lebih enak buatan ibuku 😁

Ada es cendol, tetapi kurang manis.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: fitria yuliani
text:
- Ruangannya seperti kurang maintenance, berdebu dan agak apek.
- Pelayanan ramah
- Masakannya bukan selera rakyat jelata macam saya 😁

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Erson Padapiran
text: Rumah makan ini menyajikan hidangan yang biasa disantap raja-raja Jogja, nama hidangannya unik seperti Kali ratu (ratu kera?), manuk nom (burung muda?) namun sayang rasanya tidak maksimal beberapa mungkin malah rasanya seperti frozen food,  walaupun penyajiannya menarik dan dengan harga yang lumayan, sehingga eksotisme masakan Kraton menjadi berkurang, penataan ruangnya sepertinya juga perlu diperhatikan

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Felix Limanjaya
text:
Pertama kali kesini.
Diarahkan gugel map tp krn lewat jalan jalan kecil rumah penduduk jd banyak jalan yg di portal. Tp akhirnya dengan menggunakan GPS (Gunakan Penduduk Sekitar) berhasil sampai dgn selamat.

Disini pas kebetulan banyak sekali makanan yang habis sepertinya karena musim liburan jadi banyak yang habis.
Tp akhirnya pesan nasi goreng, lalu bistik lidah, kemudian nasi set gitu (saya lupa namanya).

Secara rasa aih buat saya ok tp nothing special gimana juga. Tp makan disini dapet lah suasana agak beda rasa di kraton. :)

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Febrizky yahya
text: Sorry to say, tp rasanya hampir semuanya hambar🥲 mulai dr ayam goreng, sambalnya, semur burung dara, gurame gorengnya. Porsinya pun kecil sekali dibanding dgn harganya. Ambiencenya ok, service lumayan cepat, tapi rasanya please diperbaiki lg ya

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Nizar Fahmi Susanto
text: Suasana nyaman, layanan bagus, sayang untuk makanan bethak ayamnya dingin seperti baru dikeluarkan dari freezer

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Agatha Yuventia
text: Penasaran pengen nyobain. Kebanyakan rasa makanannya kok kurang mantap ya. Kaya kurang berani ngasi bumbu. Harga cukup mahal dengan rasa dan porsi segitu. Yah mungkin karena menjual suasana dan makanan² dari kesultanan makanya harganya jadi kaya harga sultan 😂

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Raden Kimung
text: Makanan kerajaan jogja. Untuk rasanya cukup lumayan. Pelayanan ramah & cepat. Penyajian makanan yg agak lama, harus lebih bersabar😊. Parkiran mobil & motor luas.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Astin Sudibya
text: Tempat bersih, nyaman, pelayanan cepat, ada musolanya juga..untuk makanan presentasinya bagus, cma rasanya kurang terasa (seasoningnya). rasa masakannya kurang tegas.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Rara Sarasmita
text: I'm not really sure maybe its about our own taste kali ya? soalnya udh berkespektasi lebih krna ini katanya makanan sultan, tapi mungkin lidah aku aja yg rakyat jelata. hehe. harga kalo anda berasa sobat misqueen, mending cari tmpt lain aja. 😂

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Wahyu Sugara
text: Tempatnya luar biasa,makanannya biasa , pelayanannya baik ...

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Mochi Hachi
text: kami makan disini  saat lebaran. lokasi ada dekat keraton. parkir luas. tapi kondisi resto krg manage. tempat agak brantakan. staff gercep. kami order makanan tervfavorit sini. Nasi gudeg manggar sgt tidak enak. Nasi set jg biasa2 saja.  kudapan ga enak semua. overall krg puas makan disini. Toilet agak kotor tdk dimanage baik.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Bee
text: Makanan cenderung manis ya, mungkin karena lidah orang jawa yang cenderung manis. Aneh saja Garang Asemnya kok jadi manis hehehehe. Awal pengen nyobain menu bukbernya, dengan seharga 100rb ke atas per orang harusnya tempatnya lebih proper ya, dalam arti bebas lalat dan adem, tapi sebaliknya, saya dan teman saya berasa di-steam sampai keringatan. Lalat yang berterbangan di sekitar tempat makan juga bikin kurang nyaman. Mungkin tempat wudhu juga bisa dibikin lebih proper lagi. Dari segi pelayanan sudah OK banget, hanya saja perlu dibenahi kualitas makanan dan tempatnya.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Radiansyah
text:
Kamar mandinya kurang terawat.
Selain itu 👍🏻
Lumayan murah juga.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Amirah Fathimah
text: Aku pribadi kurang suka, kurang apaya…kurang jogja bgt menurut ku. Harusnya bisa ditambah lagu2 jawa atau decor yg lebih ok. Panas bgt btw, tolong kasih kipasnya di setiap sudut, dunia makin kebakar ni soalnya🥲 Minumannya manis bgt, kurang. Makannya oke.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: leny Clover
text: Kami order gudeg manggar, nasi set traditional dan dessert pisang dan gandul dll. makanan semua kurang enak. terutama dessert sangat tidak enak. tampilan bagus tapi tidak tapi rasa kurang semua biasa saja.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Deviyana Abadi
text: Tidak ada pelayan yang menyambut tamu. Mungkin mereka sibuk, interior perlu diperbaiki.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Don A
text: Tempatnya OK, makanan tidak istimewa

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: T&B Boru
text:
Untuk kepiting enak tapi ikan guramenya kurang
Kurang fresh

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Rie Susbandayani
text:
Makanannya biasa aja lebih ke servingnya yg cantik, porsi kecil khas premium dishes lah. Lebih ke ambiance aja yg dijual.
Cukup sekali aja, buat tau. Not my cup of tea.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Barlin Fu'ad Noor
text: Nama besar / terkenal gak jaminan loh....😁😁😁...kecuali emang pengin sensasi yang berbeda....

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Andre hermawan
text: Pelayan menurut saya kurang begitu ramah,jarang senyum juga...dan untuk menu Gurameh Acar bisa diperbaiki lagi ya dari segi tampilan dan rasanya,sisanya menurut saya udah oke😁

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: sabi
text: Saya dan rombongan kantor ke sini setelah acara outbond. Menu yang ditawarkan tidak terlalu banyak karena prasmanan. Termasuk makanan rumahan. Yang saya suka adalah sate telurnya. Minuman es ketimun juga sedap. Dan kue basah yang disajikan dengan emping (lupa namanya)  menjadi favorit teman2 saya.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Irwine Mudahyansyah
text:
Tempat nyaman, service bagus, suasana juga enak..
Saya pesen garang asam tp sayang terlalu hambar, kurang bumbu dan encer banget jadi berasa pricey mqkn bisa diperbaiki

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Dhani Jogja
text: Restaurant di komplek kraton Jogjakarta yg menyajikan menu menu para Sultan Jogja

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Eddy Suryawan
text: Bale Raos merupakan restaurant atau tempat makan yg bernuansa jawa. Letaknya yg tidak terlalu jauh dari bangsal kencono kraton jogjakarta dan masih berada didalam kompleks kraton sangat direkomendasikan buat pecinta kuliner masakan jawa. Menu masakan dan minuman ala raja2 keraton joga bisa dinikmati dengan nyaman. Harga cukup oke sesuai dengan tempat dan pelayanan.... cuman pada waktu tengah hari kadang terasa agak gerah.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Anjelita
text: Wktu datang penuh, sudah reservasi sih tp pelayanan nya ga ramah, minta jam 7 jam 8 belum ready makanannya. Pelayan nya tolong ramah ya jangan jutek2 sama pelanggan. Kan jd sebel

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Chaerul Huda (hoed_hoed)
text: Kalau menurut lidah saya yang masa kecil dan remaja di desa dengan menu jawa, di bale raos belum menemukan yang istimewa cita rasa masakannya, untuk suasana okelah buat kumpul kumpul atau acara bareng temen or keluarga

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Anton Susanto
text:
Konsep suasana dan tempatnya sangat otentik dengan budaya jawa.
Menyenangkan bisa mencicipi menu kesukaan para raja jawa.
Rasa dan penampilan makanan nampaknya sudah ada pertemuan dengan budaya barat.

title: Bale Raos - The Sultan's Dishes
name: Tunggul Jundanto
text:
Datang malem, suasana serem angker. Kalo siang mungkin asyik.
Tapi makanan menarik. Kayaknya emang suguhan bagi para bangsawan kraton.
Overall : tempat wajib bagi para kuliner utk dicoba
